title: How to Use Honey on Mobile (Apple and Android)

steps.title: Download the Honey app from the Google Play Store (Android) or App Store (iOS).
steps.content: Download the Honey app from the Google Play Store (Android) or App Store (iOS). Honey is a free app that's highly rated and popular on the app stores for couponing. You can search "Honey" in the search bar at the top of your screen (Google Play Store) or in the search tab at the bottom of the screen (App Store). The icon looks like a cursive "h" on an orange background and is developed by Honey or Honey Science.

steps.title: Open Honey.
steps.content: Open Honey. This app icon looks like a cursive "h" on an orange background that you'll find on one of your Home screens, in the app drawer, or by searching. If you still have the Google Play Store or App Store open, you can also tap Open or Launch instead.

steps.title: Tap the account tab.
steps.content: Tap the account tab. It's in the bottom right corner of your screen with the image of an avatar.

steps.title: Tap Log In or Register.
steps.content: Tap Log In or Register . You'll see this centered near the top of your screen under an empty profile picture.

steps.title: Tap Not a member? Join Honey.
steps.content: Tap Not a member? Join Honey . It's at the bottom of your screen.

steps.title: Join using your Google, Facebook, PayPal, or Apple account information or tap Join with Email.
steps.content: Join using your Google, Facebook, PayPal, or Apple account information or tap Join with Email . If you rather not connect Honey to any of those accounts, you can tap to create a Honey account with an email address. [1] X Research source You can also use a web browser if you don't want to use the app. Navigate to https://www.joinhoney.com .

steps.title: Open Honey.
steps.content: Open Honey. This app icon looks like a cursive "h" on an orange background that you'll find on one of your Home screens, in the app drawer, or by searching. You'll see a list of items categorized by "Your Daily Deals," "Trending Stores," and more.

steps.title: Tap an item to view it.
steps.content: Tap an item to view it. The details page will open so you can view more images, the product description, and price.

steps.title: Tap Shop on Website.
steps.content: Tap Shop on Website . You'll be redirected to the retailer's site, but you'll see the Honey icon in the lower right corner of your screen. You can tap this to see what coupons or savings are available with this retailer as well as a tab that explains the rewards you can get.

steps.title: Make a purchase.
steps.content: Make a purchase. When you make a purchase, you'll earn Honey Gold. You can find a brief list of participating retailers at https://www.joinhoney.com/honeygold/browse , but there are over 5,500 retailers and most aren't listed. [2] X Research source To track your Honey Gold, tap the profile icon in the Honey app and look for the gold coin symbol.
